response.original_title: My Husband's Way Back to Glory
response.overview: After years of unwavering effort and perseverance, Levi transformed his life from one of deep poverty to becoming a globally recognized billionaire entrepreneur. Despite his incredible success and newfound life of luxury, he never lost touch with his humble beginnings. To pay tribute to his roots, Levi chose to return to his modest hometown for a grand wedding celebration with his beloved wife, Sienna. But instead of being warmly welcomed, Sienna's relatives, clouded by their own biases, assumed Levi had come back in disgrace.
response.title: My Husband's Way Back to Glory
